display_information.name: Channel Chameleon
display_information.description: A WIP bot that hosts a game around restricting what messages you can send.
display_information.long_description:
A bot that hosts a game around restricting what messages you can send in a particular channel. The game rules are still a work in progress; the project is mostly so I can learn how to write a Slack bot.

"Chameleon" comes from the idea that the bot always adapts based on the messages sent to the channel. It's not a great name, but I couldn't think of anything better.
